Message: I heard the sound of a child crying.

I called out to a young boy
crouching down in a corner,

and he had a look of surprise
when we exchanged glances.
As he sobbed, he spoke to me.

“I just came to watch
all the shows...but...
the wrath of the dead...”
That’s all I could make out.

Hmmm... Maybe the uproar
just now scared him?

But, he wasn’t the only one
who was shaken up.
Everyone was...

If the ringmaster found out
that I let an audience go
home with gloomy faces,
he’d definitely give me
an earful.

Gather ’round!
The world’s greatest
gunslinger’s special show
is about to begin!
